thread.title: American Dream™ Announces Partnership With Cinemex
thread.title_full: American Dream™ Announces Partnership With Cinemex - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: American Dream™ Announces Partnership With Cinemex
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE American Dream
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- World-Class Developer Triple Five is proud to announce that Cinemex will be featured at American Dream New Jersey.
Mexico City -based Cinemex, is revolutionizing the movie going experience. As one of only four locations in the country, and the only location in the New York Metropolitan area, the 1,400 seat complex will host 12 duo screens, dine-in cinemas with private viewing rooms, oversize seating and Cinemex X4D. The X4D adventure engages all the senses with state of the art surround sound, moving seats, and an environment with wind, rain, snow, fog, and scents all synchronized to the on-screen action. This one of a kind experience will raise the bar for moviegoers and make watching your favorite movie truly unforgettable.
Chef Mikel Alonso of Biko – named one of the top 50 restaurants in the world – will curate the dine-in theatre experience. Additionally, celebrated mixologist Mica Rousseau will complement Alonso with an exclusive and traditional cocktail offering.
"As the sixth largest cinema chain worldwide, our main focus is to bring our revolutionary movie going experience to the U.S. We believe American Dream will create the perfect setting for Cinemex. We could not have chosen a better location to create our flagship presence," said Jaime Rionda , Cinemex's Chief Operating Officer. He continued, "We are convinced that this is an important step in our incursion into the U.S. market, and we're excited to contribute to American Dream's visitor experience with our innovative movie theater dine-in concept."
"Keeping in mind how the movie going experience has evolved we have chosen Cinemex to deliver our customers exactly what they want with luxury seating, dining and all the bells and whistles they could possibly ask for," said Don Ghermezian , President, Triple Five.
About American Dream
American Dream is being developed by The Triple Five Group of Companies, owners of the two largest shopping and entertainment centers in North America , Mall of America and West Edmonton Mall.
Opening in late summer 2017, phase one of American Dream will house approximately 3 million square feet of shopping, entertainment and attractions and host 40 million guests annually. www.americandream.com
About Cinemex
Operating for more than 20 years, Cinemex is the 6th largest cinema chain worldwide. In Mexico it operates more than 279 theaters and 2,431 screens. In 2013, Cinemex was awarded the International Achievement Award in Exhibition at the ShowEast (Prometheus Global Media Film Expo Group) annual conference.
